goal.ch: This course introduces to the students the theoretical concepts and practical techniques of financial statement analysis. After taking this course, students should be able to:(1) Use financial statements and ratio analysis to assess a company’s financial health, recent performance, and future prospects.(2) Know the techniques of forecasting and planning. (3) Develop forecasted financial statements and make estimates of a firm’s value.
